# ENTITY::SET_ENTITY_RENDER_SCORCHED

## Parameters
* **ENTITY_INDEX** entity
* **BOOL** renderScorched

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Setup an entity to be rendered as scorched/burned down
